title: Account Transfer
body: Wait wtf? 5 to 6 weeks? are u serious yo why the fck did you guys even take it off in the 1st place? you guys make millions in donations, so the regular is a lot more and u telling me none of u guys sitting behind the screen cant fix this sooner? tbh your developers need a new job cause coding isn't for them. That is sad as fck. 5 - 6 WEEKS, just stop the bs and say u not releasing transfers until next season because thats basically what u saying

replies.body: Hopefully those transfer are able to be fixed sooner than later, but be sure to check back in [**HollyMonster's post**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update) for the quickest updates.
5-6 weeks = quickest updates lol. Riot should wipe their whole team and stop paying ppl with lunch money and give em a REAL salary
been trying to transfer since mid october and it's really annoying to have to wait this long because riot doesnt want to enable them till next season, "issues" my ass

in all  honesty fuck it. That makes no sense 5-6 week you might aswell build a new game to play.  to be honest thats probably why the comments to that thread is locked cause even riot knows people are going to drill into them about the bs they just said. 5-6weeks..... tell me what takes that long... gotta fly to EUW? LAN? etc etc and plug in the cord?
nothing surprises me anymore. there's nothing we can do about it.
